thread.title: Trump - Any immigration plan without border wall 'waste of time'

title: Trump - Any immigration plan without border wall 'waste of time'
text:
February 5, 2018 / 2:54 PM / Updated 5 minutes ago Trump - Any immigration plan without border wall 'waste of time' Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Any congressional immigration plan that does not provide for his long-promised wall along the U.S.-Mexico border ‘is a total waste of time,’ U.S. President Donald Trump said on Monday as two top senators planned to unveil a bipartisan compromise plan. 
“Any deal on DACA that does not include STRONG border security and the desperately needed WALL is a total waste of time. March 5th is rapidly approaching and the Dems seem not to care about DACA. Make a deal!” Trump wrote on Twitter. Reporting by Susan HeaveyEditing by Chizu Nomiyama
